text: Sunflower oil shortages in Ukraine due to energy infrastructure attacks? 🌻🚨 Analysts say supply is low, but factors like vegetable oil prices will contribute to price reductions. 💰🍳 Refineries offer UAH 16,600 per tonne, but experts predict a drop to UAH 15,300-15,500. 📉👀 Let's keep an eye on veggie oil prices! 🧐
